channel.title: ssh2_shell on 壹零壹玖
channel.description: Recent content in ssh2_shell on 壹零壹玖

item.title: mac安装php之ssh2_shell扩展
item.description: 问题 Error : Class 'ssh2_connect' not found 通过源码安装 wget https://pecl.php.net/get/ssh2-1.1.2.tgz tar -zxvf ssh2-1.1.2.tgz cd ssh2-1.1.2 phpize ./configure --with-ssh2 make make install 配置php.ini extensions=ssh2.so 校验 ~ » php -m | grep ssh2 ssh2
